name: Music Rumble
description: In this game you are an evil cube what makes very bad music and doesn't like good music and your opponents are musicians who doesn't like bad music. You must dodge your opponents notes or you will die. I know this doesn't sounds good, but if you have any suggestions about what the player should be or whatever, leave it in the comments section please. Im also releasing this game on Google Play, so if you are interested stay tuned for that.
